scripts.start: concurrently "npm run swa-api" "npm run swa-web" "npm run swa-db"
scripts.swa-dab: cd swa-db-connections && dotenv -e ../.env -- dab start --config staticwebapp.database.config.json
scripts.db-reset: cd Db && dotnet ef database drop -f && dotnet ef database update && dotnet run
scripts.db-migrate: cd Db && dotnet ef migrations add "$(date +%s)"
scripts.db-update: cd Db && dotnet ef database update
scripts.db-drop: cd Db && dotnet ef database drop -f
scripts.init-local-env: jj-envset PULUMI_CONFIG_PASSPHRASE "P@ssword!" && jj-envprompt AZURE_TENANT_ID && jj-envprompt AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
scripts.infra-login-new: jj-run -e .env az login --tenant $AZURE_TENANT_ID --output none && jj-run -e .env az account set --subscription $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID && az account show && pulumi login file:// && cd Infra && jj-run -e ../.env pulumi stack init local && jj-run -e ../.env pulumi config set AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
scripts.infra-login-old: dotenv -e .env -- cross-var az login --tenant $AZURE_TENANT_ID --output none && dotenv -e .env -- cross-var az account set --subscription $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID && az account show && pulumi login file:// && cd Infra && dotenv -e ../.env -- cross-var pulumi stack init local && dotenv -e ../.env -- cross-var pulumi config set AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID $AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
scripts.infra-up: cd Infra && dotenv -e ../.env -- pulumi up && dotenv -e ../.env -- jj-envrun DB_CONNECTION_STRING "pulumi stack output ConnectionString" -e ../.env && npm run db-reset
